titles.title: Accountability in Department of Veterans Affairs Scheduling and Consult Management Act
Accountability in Department of Veterans Affairs Scheduling and Consult Management Act
Accountability in Department of Veterans Affairs Scheduling and Consult Management Act

A bill to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to review the processes and requirements of the Department of Veterans Affairs for scheduling appointments for health care and conducting consultations under the laws administered by the Secretary, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Reported by Senator Moran with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 537.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Accountability in Department of Veterans Affairs Scheduling and Consult Management Act
This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to implement training and monitoring procedures related to the scheduling of VA health care appointments.
